meanings.definition: The extent to which something is covered or protected.
meanings.sent1: The coverages of the umbrella ensured we stayed dry during the rainstorm.
meanings.sent2: The insurance policy's coverages included protection for theft and accidents.
meanings.sent3: The coverages of the blanket were so good that even the cold couldn't sneak in.
meanings.sent4: Her love acted as a warm coverage, shielding him from life's harsh realities.
meanings.sent5: The coverages of the fortress were impenetrable, keeping the kingdom safe.

meanings.definition: The range of risks covered by an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the coverages of the insurance policy helped him choose the right one for his needs.
meanings.sent2: The coverages of the health insurance plan included doctor visits and prescription medications.
meanings.sent3: The coverages of the insurance policy were like a safety net, ready to catch any unexpected falls.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the coverages was a shield against financial uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The coverages of the policy were like a protective bubble, guarding against unforeseen events.
